Weapons and Jewels can be augmented with Life Stones to give additional properties and even skills!
A Life Stone shows the level of the character who can use it.

Augment weapons through the Blacksmith NPC of every town.
Go to a blacksmith and click Augment Item.
Place all the items into the boxes as indicated.
Select the weapon to be augmented, the Life Stone, and Gemstones in the Augment window.
Click the Augment button.

Warning! Augmentation does not prevent your item from being dropped upon death!

Good luck!
